Class MicroplatePositionConfigurationDTO

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared.Microplate
      ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared.configuration.microplatemeasurement.MicroplatePositionConfigurationDTO
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class MicroplatePositionConfigurationDTO
extends Microplate

Configuration of the positions to measure in a microplate measurement.

Author:
langmo
See Also:

Default constructor. Initializes a 96 well plate.

                                          int numWellsY,
                                          double wellWidth,
                                          double wellHeight)
Constructor for a custom defined microplate.

Parameters:
numWellsX - number of wells in the horizontal direction.
numWellsY - number of wells in the vertical direction.
wellWidth - width of a well (well-well distance).
wellHeight - height of a well (well-well distance).

numPositions - Number of positions.

Sets if the given well should be measured or not.

isSinglePosition

public boolean isSinglePosition()
Returns true if this configuration is configured such that only one position per well is defined (and not necessarily if only one position is activated).

Returns:
True if only one position per well is defined.

Returns true if the given well should be measured.

Parameters:
well - The well.
Returns:
True if the given well should be measured, false otherwise.

setMeasurePosition

public void setMeasurePosition(boolean measure,
                               int posY,
                               int posX)
Sets if a given position in a well should be measured.

Parameters:
measure - True if the position should be measured.
posY - The y-index of the position in a well, starting with 0.
posX - The x-index of the position in a well, starting with 0.

isMeasurePosition

public boolean isMeasurePosition(int posY,
                                 int posX)
Returns if a given position in a well should be measured.

Parameters:
posY - The y-index of the position in a well, starting with 0.
posX - The x-index of the position in a well, starting with 0.
Returns:
True if the position should be measured.

setNumPositions

public boolean setNumPositions(int numPositions)
Description copied from class: Microplate
Microplate measurements can be "misused" to measure just some arbitrary positions. Call this function to define the number of positions. Automatically sets isAliasMicroplate() to true.

Overrides:
setNumPositions in class Microplate
Parameters:
numPositions - The number of abitrary positions to measure.
Returns:
Returns TRUE if microplate dimensions changed.

setMicroplateDimensions

public boolean setMicroplateDimensions(int numWellsX,
                                       int numWellsY,
                                       double wellWidth,
                                       double wellHeight,
                                       int wellPositionsX,
                                       int wellPositionsY,
                                       double wellMarginX,
                                       double wellMarginY)
Description copied from class: Microplate
Sets the dimensions of the microplate and the measured positions.

Overrides:
setMicroplateDimensions in class Microplate
Parameters:
numWellsX - Number of wells in the x-direction.
numWellsY - Number of wells in the y-direction.
wellWidth - Width of a well.
wellHeight - Height of a well.
wellPositionsX - Number of measured positions in one well in the x-direction.
wellPositionsY - Number of measured positions in one well in the y-direction.
wellMarginX - Relative margin between the well border and the first measured position in the x-direction.
wellMarginY - Relative margin between the well border and the first measured position in the y-direction.
Returns:
Returns TRUE if microplate dimensions changed.

getMeasuredWells

public boolean[][] getMeasuredWells()
Returns a matrix of the size of the microplate, where each element is indicating if the respective well should be measured or not.

Returns:
Matrix of measured wells.

getMeasuredPositionsInWell

public boolean[][] getMeasuredPositionsInWell()
Returns a matrix of the size of the positions in a well, where each element is indicating if the respective position should be measured or not.

Returns:
Matrix of measured positions.

                              double zeroPositionY)
Creates a default path given this configuration. Same as createDefaultPath(zeroPositionX, zeroPositionY, 0).

Parameters:
zeroPositionX - The x-position of the center of the well A1;
zeroPositionY - The y-position of the center of the well A1;

                              double zeroPositionY,
                              double zeroPositionFocus)
Creates a default path given this configuration.

Parameters:
zeroPositionX - The x-position of the center of the well A1;
zeroPositionY - The y-position of the center of the well A1;
zeroPositionFocus - The focus with which the positions should be initialized.

isInitialized

public boolean isInitialized()
Returns true if the exact x/y position for every well is initialized.

Returns:
True if each position in each well has an associated x/y/focus value

getTotalMeasuredPositions

public int getTotalMeasuredPositions()
Returns the total number of measured positions in a well times the number of measured wells.

Returns:
Overall number of measured positions.

setSelectAllWells

public void setSelectAllWells(boolean select)
Select or unselects all wells in a microplate.

Parameters:
select - True if all wells should be selected/measured, false if all wells should be unselected.

setSelectAllWellPositions

public void setSelectAllWellPositions(boolean select)
Select or unselects all positions in a well.

Parameters:
select - True if all positions should be selected/measured, false if all positions should be unselected.

isNoneSelected

public boolean isNoneSelected()
Returns if either no well or no position inside a well is selected/should be measured.

Returns:
True if no position in no well should be measured, false if at least one position in one well should be measured.

isAllWellsSelected

public boolean isAllWellsSelected()
Returns true if all wells of the microplate are selected to be measured.

Returns:
True if all wells should be measured.

isAllPositionsSelected

public boolean isAllPositionsSelected()
Returns true if all positions in each well of the microplate are selected to be measured.

Returns:
True if all positions should be measured.

                        Well well,
                        int posY,
                        int posX)
Sets the x, y, and focus value for the given position in the given well.

Parameters:

well - The well.
posY - The y-index of the position in the well, starting with 0.
posX - The x-index of the position in the well, starting with 0.

getPosition

public XYAndFocusPositionDTO getPosition(Well well,
                                         int posY,
                                         int posX)
Returns the previously initialized x, y, and focus value for the given position in the given well, or NULL if the data was yet not initialized or the given position or the given well should not be measured.

Parameters:
well - The well.
posY - The y-index of the position in the well, starting with 0.
posX - The x-index of the position in the well, starting with 0.
Returns:
The previously initialized x, y, and focus value for the given position in the given well.
